channel.title: The system cannot find the path specified?
channel.description:
i am trying to set enviroment variables, when i click on it i dont know which where i need to put CLASSPATH and PATH. top or bottom.
1. can someone tell me top or bottom. 2. is it CLASSPATH or classpath and or PATH or path??
thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2009, 05:58:40 pm[/size][hr]bump, someone reply please!!!!
